item.title: Sean Hackbarth Works for Fred
item.description: Sean Hackbarth, the guy who runs The American Mind blog, has jumped onboard the Fred Thompson victory train as a member of the web team. Congratulations to Sean and to Fred. Both will benefit greatly from the effort, I am sure. If you’re not with Fred yet, it’s definitely not too late.
